metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4434 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Dropbear SSH Server before 2013.59 generates error messages for a failed logon attempt with different time delays depending on whether the user account exists, which allows remote attackers to discover valid usernames.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2013.60-1ubuntu2
dropbear-bin - 2013.60-1ubuntu2
dropbear-initramfs - 2013.60-1ubuntu2
dropbear-run - 2013.60-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2013.60-1ubuntu2').
